mapper.select: select count(*) from balance_like where mem_id = #{mem_id} and bal_seq = #{bal_seq}
select count(*) from balance_like where bal_seq = #{bal_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into balance (bal_seq, mem_id, bal_content, bal_date, bal_img, bal_left, bal_right, bal_reward, bal_time, bal_left_color, bal_right_color ) values(bal.seqnum.nextval, #{mem_id}, #{bal_content}, sysdate, #{bal_img}, #{bal_left}, #{bal_right}, #{bal_reward}, #{bal_time}, #{bal_left_color},#{bal_right_color})
mapper.select: select b.*,(select count(*) from balance_like l where l.bal_seq = b.bal_seq ) as bal_like, (select mem_img from member_info m where m.mem_id = b.mem_id) as mem_img, (select count(*) from balance_cmt c where c.bal_seq = b.bal_seq) as bal_cmt_cnt, (select count(*) from balance_vote v where v.bal_seq = b.bal_seq and bal_vote ='L' ) as bal_left_count, (select count(*) from balance_vote v where v.bal_seq = b.bal_seq and bal_vote ='R' ) as bal_right_count from balance b where bal_seq = #{bal_seq}
